l: Like any Cosmos-SDK chain, the hardware requirements are pretty modest.

p: 3x CPUs; the faster clock speed the better
Permanent Internet connection (traffic will be minimal during devnet; 10Mbps will be plenty - for production at least 100Mbps is expected)
4x CPUs; the faster clock speed the better
Permanent Internet connection (traffic will be minimal during devnet; 10Mbps will be plenty - for production at least 100Mbps is expected)

jika bootstrap error bisa ganti dengan ini
Sebelum ganti bootstrap silahkan kill node kalian

- DM botnya enter IP Address VPS Kalian
- untuk cek status node tinggal enter info aja di botnya
